messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report
Sector vendor prices is currently at 150%.
The station spending power is currently 2300 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 506 Credits.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 3. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Salutations, Space Station 3. We have reports from contractors of paranormal activity happening in local space around the establishment. Please be aware for light supernatural phenomena, and have a nice shift.

Anomaly Alert
